DOC.detailed_description: Two different randomization group define patient obstructive prosthetic valve thrombosis include group randomly . In first arm , thrombolytic therapy ( TT ) perform patient obstructive prosthetic valve thrombosis . The TT regimen depend functional status patient . In patient NYHA class III-IV dyspnea low dose , relatively faster TT regimen ( 25 mg tPA/6 hour ) perform . In patient NYHA class I-II dyspnea TT low dose ultra slow infusion tPA ( 25 mg tPA/25 hour ) perform . During TT , patient follow transesophageal echocardiography every 24 hour . In second arm , redo valve surgery perform obstructive valve thrombosis .
